mapper.update: update warehouse_log set productId = #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation_type = #{operationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation_time = #{operationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, productId, product_name, operation_type, quantity, operator, operation_time from warehouse_log
